name: Bologna Glacier
description: Configuration preset for Bologna Glacier, Brintnell-Bologna Icefield, Northwest Territories, Canada

location.description: Bologna Glacier, Brintnell-Bologna Icefield, Nahanni National Park Reserve, NWT

notes: Bologna Glacier is part of the Brintnell-Bologna Icefield in Northwest Territories
Located within Nahanni National Park Reserve, roughly 350 km west of Fort Simpson
This is the largest ice field in Northwest Territories
The region margin of 2.0° provides good coverage for glacial analysis
Target resolution of 0.0025° (~275m) matches MISR native resolution
